ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend it to students who are interested in learning more about German cinema, more about Cold War media relationships, and more about "new wave" film movements outside of France.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I saw many movies I had never seen before.

This course offered me, among other things, a whole new canon of strange films, a more nuanced understanding of new wave movements, of the relationship between the left in a capitalist society and its communist counterpart, of how a fraught inheritance is suppressed, sublimated, and appropriated in popular cinema, etc.
